Hi, I'm Billy Chin

I was born in 1997 and grew up in Taiwan (and still live here). My native language is Traditional Chinese.

As you can tell from my posts, I'm a software engineer. Currently, I work with Appier (opens new window). Besides, I make open source contributions and became a part of VuePress (opens new window) core team.
